Articles.Content: Because I am currently going currently going crazy without KSP, I'm serious, I have decided to come back, but I can't seem to remember the password, and the amount email, according to the website (I AM ABSOLUTELY SURE!!!) but I can't seem to reset the password... I know I should be probably contacting support but the community hasn't let me down before and by judging by the time I've been gone there are a lot of additions so, ...guys?

If you bought from the store, you're probably best contacting [email protected]. There really isn't a lot that I or anybody else can do until then.

Bear in mind the office probably won't be open until Monday. Hope you get it sorted!
